resources.string: Keep your eyes on the road

Dialing and navigating have never been easier: a simple tap or slide of your finger anywhere on the screen will dial your chosen contact or navigate to your chosen destination. You can also record a memo.\n

Setting up: 
 Easily set your most frequent contacts and destinations and you are ready to go. 

 For example: 1 TAP dials mom, 2 TAPS dials work, a slide up navigates you home…
 If you wish you can record your command, which will sound every time you use the same TAP/Slide, this will give you a confirmation without looking at the screen… 


Example: if 1 TAP dials mom, just record "dialing mom" 
 1. Choose EDIT to set your TAP commands. (Click and hold edit button)
 2. Click the chosen TAP Slide
 3. Choose command from dialog box
 	 1. Dial > Choose contact from your contacts
 	 2. GPS > Set destination in GPS application
 	 3. Record > No further action (Auto rec.)
 4. Optional: Record your command which will sound when you Tap/slide, for example: "dialing home" or "navigating to the office”
Click button to record your command, which will sound when you TAP/Slide
Please insert your address for this tap gesture
After saving this gesture will launch waze app \n and navigate to the address you specified
